entry.title: Decentralized Naming Protocol BIP
entry.summary: Chris, a member of the cryptocurrency community, has developed a new BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) that introduces a decentralized naming protocol. This protocol is associated with recent BIPs sent to the mailing list and aims to provide a more efficient method for naming and identifying various elements within the blockchain network. The BIP can be found on GitHub at https://github.com/cgilliard/bips/blob/naming/bip-XXXX.mediawiki. Chris invites others to provide feedback, questions, or comments on the new proposal.
